19.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Changed IBAN/Bankaccount number on screen, removed BankID
11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
28.04.2011 GB SCR16371 Eliminate GNRL_LANGUAGE
25.03.2011 SH SCR16300 Added button Remark
29.01.2010 GB SCR15231 Changed condition for selection, extende verification if
button OK is pressed
06.02.2009 GB SCR14368 Replaced 'F2'Kbd by RaiseEvent = Cancel
03.03.2008 SH SCR9302 Reduced argument list of GM100
19.02.2008 SH SCR13407 Adde button Excel
01.06.2006 SH SCR11381 Button "Word letter": Changed selection of language
30.05.2006 SH SCR11344 Changed call of OPH101C to be called inside a single
14.02.2006 SH SCR10397 Added new HYPB fields
//04-11-2005 JP SCR #9096 new Filelist function
31.08.2005 SH SCR8988 Fixed bug if "Only own payments" is set from TRUE to FALSE
if stat(0,'C'mode) (--> Problems with storing empty BADP row)
21.06.2005 EE SCR#8510 Usage of GNRL changed to read only/no cache:
01.07.2005 SH SCR7418 Added proper logically locking strategy
24.08.2004 SH SCR6880 Added new button "New scan"
17.03.2004 BT SCR5199 add Button Word Document ( new task 'Generate Word Docu-
ment' (Word Merge)
08.08.2003 SH SCR4056 Extended test if payment handling is possible with
- BADT_ONDESKTOP = FALSE, uses message PH0156 if TRUE
16.06.2003 SH SCR3778 Added new column USER and checkbox "Only own payments"
26.03.2003 RR -> SCR3196 Implementation of shortcut handling
17.02.2003 SCR3013 SH Added new column BADP_BANK_ADMNO
30.01.2003 SCR1793 SH/RR Add argument to GM100 (see SPECS)
20.08.2002 SCR1933 SH New button "Document" call DesktopReader and OPH101C will
- be only executable (button OK) if the BADT_ACTIVEUSER = ''
15.05.2002 SH Solved problems with user rights to enable Button OK
13.03.2002 SH SCR997 Disabled Button OK if user has only QUERY rights
-- Onyl if BADT row for the current BADP row is not locked by another user,
-- it's possible to handled the payment with OPH101C (Button OK) and also
-- BADT_ONDESKTOP has to be FASLE
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- Cancel
-- Button OK or ENTER
-- Check if releated BADT row is locked by another user or still on desktop
-- If there is no row
-- BADT row not locked and not on desktop, handling possible
-- Do not locate on already handled payment
error handler if abacus server not available
for Word Letter:
-- Get BNKA_NAME for display
.. inform user that scanning index prepared
-- Update v.BTCP_BADP_ID to achieve a re-compute on BLHS after coming back from
OPH113, to show the red retangle around button "Remark"
-- Initialize arguments to set BADT_ACTIVEUSER
... update related BADP row
-- Column titles

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Date statement')&';'&MlsTrans ('Admin number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Bankaccount number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Name account')&';'&MlsTrans ('Amount account curr.')&';'&MlsTrans ('Curr')&';'&MlsTrans ('User')

Text.val: -- Set active user to BADT
@OPH101C has to be called from OPH104 in a single transaction, because if
Magic crashes, while the user is working in OPH101C, then we have to make sure
that the payment is still available via OPH104, if the payment was not fully
handled by the user (BADP_UNALLOCATED has to be manually changed
in OPH101C)
-- Check if payment is completely handled by user, if not OPH101C has to be
called again, until the payment could be booked or BADP_UNALLOCATED
is reset to TRUE by the user
@This additional test has to be done here, because if the users starts a new
program from the menu, while they are working in OPH101C to handle a payment,
the tests (Pamynt handling OK) in OPH101C are not performed
-- Remove active user from BADT, only if payment is not handled
-- Payment not fully handled, go back to OPH101C
